spot-no-name.en: You must add the spot name

name-too-long.en: Name of the spot is too long or too short
name-too-long.pl: Nazwa spota zbyt długa lub zbyt krótka

photos-err.en: You can add up to 5 photos

mark-err.en: You need to mark the spot on the map

surface-err.en: The surface score can't be more than 10
surface-err.pl: Ocena nie może być większa niż 10

verif-waiting.en: Spot has been added and is waiting for verification

photos-verif.en: The photots are waiting for verification

not-logged-in.en: You need to be logged in to do it
not-logged-in.pl: Musisz być zalogowany, żeby to zrobić

pass-short.en: Password needs to be at least 6 characters long

username-short.en: Username needs to have at least 3 characters
username-short.pl: Nazwa użytkownika musi zawierać conajmniej 3 znaki
